amendment.description: An amendment numbered 16 printed in House Report 118-12 to establish that parents will be granted the opportunity to address their school board regarding a complaint about a violation of parental rights.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. McCormick.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
